      • getParameterToUse

        protected Parameter getParameterToUse(Constructor<?> constructorToExamine,
                          int constructorParameterIndex,
                          Parameter parameter)
        If there is no Parameter defined for the constructor arg, (Other than Default), then checks to see if there are Named annotations or Qualifier annotations attached to the argument and uses those as ComponentParameters instead. If not it uses the superclass default behavior.
        Overrides:
        getParameterToUse in class ConstructorInjection.ConstructorInjector<T>
        Parameters:
        constructorToExamine - the current constructor candidate.
        constructorParameterIndex - the current index of the constructor arguments array.
        parameter - the currently defined parameter.
        Returns:
